main event: A round object the size of a pinhead was observed over Overland, Missouri on 7 October 1957.
interesting points: The object changed color from reddish orange to white as it disappeared., The sighting lasted for about one minute., The object was reported to likely be an aircraft or a balloon reflecting the sun's rays., The observer was a fireman named Mr. ---- who had a clear view of the event., The object moved in a straight path to the east before disappearing over the horizon.
